doc:
Ted Cassidy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Cassidy 0 Theodore Crawford Cassidy (July 31, 1932 – January 16, 1979) was an American actor of radio, television and film and voice artist. Noted for his tall stature at 6 ft 9 in (206 cm) and his deep bass voice, he tended to play unusual characters in offbeat or science-fiction series such as Star Trek and I Dream of Jeannie, and is best known for the role of Lurch on The Addams Family in the mid-1960s. He is also known for narrating The Incredible Hulk TV series. Theodore_Crawford_Cassidy ( July_31_,_1932 – January_16_,_1979 ) was an_American_actor of radio_,_television_and_film_and_voice_artist . Noted for his_tall_stature at 6_ft_9 in (_206_cm_) and his_deep_bass_voice , he tended_to_play unusual_characters in offbeat_or_science-fiction_series such_as Star_Trek and I Dream of Jeannie , and is_best_known for the_role of Lurch on The_Addams_Family in the_mid-1960s . He is_also_known for narrating The_Incredible_Hulk_TV_series .
